# Black Powder Fortune (Trait)
## Overview
**Black Powder Fortune:** You have little to fear when thereâ€™s a gun in your hand. As long as you are wielding a firearm, you gain a +2 trait bonus on all saving throws against curse, fear, and emotion effects.
